File Listing Plugin
Last Published: 2011-06-24  | Version: 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT
File Listing Plugin
Parent Project
  • Sonatype OSS Parent

file-list:list

Full name:

eu.numberfour.maven.plugins:file-list-maven-plugin:1.0.0-SNAPSHOT:list

Description:

Creates a JSON formatted list of files form a base directory, and optional includes and excludes.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Requires dependency resolution of artifacts in scope: compile.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
baseDir String - Base directory of the scanning process
Default value is: ${basedir}/target/.
excludes String[] - Ant-style exclude pattern. For example **.* is all files
ignoreCase boolean - Whether to ignore case
includes String[] - Ant-style include pattern. For example **.* is all files
outputFile String - File into which to save the output of the transformation.
Default value is: ${basedir}/target/file-list.json.

Parameter Details

baseDir:

Base directory of the scanning process
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${basedir}/target/

excludes:

Ant-style exclude pattern. For example **.* is all files
  • Type: java.lang.String[]
  • Required: No

ignoreCase:

Whether to ignore case
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No

includes:

Ant-style include pattern. For example **.* is all files
  • Type: java.lang.String[]
  • Required: No

outputFile:

File into which to save the output of the transformation.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${basedir}/target/file-list.json
